# PumuPlay

PumuPlay is a modern web platform designed for SMEs (Small and Medium-sized Enterprises). It focuses on providing cutting-edge automation, tailored micro SaaS solutions, and autonomous agentic agents to reduce operational overhead and unlock peak productivity.

## Core Services

- **Automation Workflow**: Automate daily tasks to reduce operational costs and streamline business processes.
- **AI Agentic Agents**: Intelligent agents providing support across social media platforms (Facebook, Line) and integrated websites.
- **Micro SaaS**: Small-scale software solutions helping businesses run smoother, reduce costs, and improve productivity.
- **Meta Programming**: Efficient development support for Micro SaaS platforms.

## Contact Information

- **Website**: https://pumuplay.com
- **X (Twitter)**: https://x.com/pumuplay
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/pumuplay
- **Contact Form**: https://pumuplay.com/#contact
